short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have a handy chat with GPT 3.5 Turbo!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Handy GPT with a Phone-Like interface! 
Instead of going to different tabs when you want to ask GPT, you can ask it for quick questions of your choosing!

Required Steps:
- Add the Extension to Chrome.
- Go to the Extension tab and navigate to Options.
- Add your OPENAI API KEY and click SAVE (This can be generated from here after you sign in: https://lnkd.in/d4YBkt5c)
- Enjoy the Mobile-Like interface

Feel free to suggest any bugs you face!
